data.actual_result: Displays Success Message when adding someone who is already your friend.
data.expected_result: Displays Error Message: Your Already Friends with that Person!
data.short_description: When you try to send a friend request to someone your already friends with it displays the Success message on Desktop and iOS.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Friends - Click Add Friend - Type in one of your Friend's Username and Discriminator - Click Send Friend Request - Sucess Message is Displayed but no one is added to the Pending Tab because they were already your friend.
